sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Hi ${event.group.owner},

I saw that you have an upcoming Meetup scheduled for ${event.date} which is very exciting! Can you please add a finalized agenda to your Meetup.com event page? This will help spark interest within your developer community.

I do want to let you know that we will not be able to send out a promotional email to the developers in your community because it takes us at least three weeks to create and send the email out. However, please let me know if you need anything else from my end before your event.

Thank you for your efforts as an organizer!

Best,

Tanvi Gokhale

Platform Product Marketing Co-op

servicenow
sysevent_email_template.name: Meetup Not Finalized (under 21 day away)
sysevent_email_template.subject: ServiceNow ${event.group.name}
